# UIActionSheetStyle.automatic

**Case**

Takes the appearance of the bottom bar if specified; otherwise, same as [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIActionSheetStyle/default].

## Declaration

```swift
case automatic
```

## Constants

- **UIActionSheetStyle.default**: The default style.
- **UIActionSheetStyle.blackTranslucent**: A black translucent style.
- **UIActionSheetStyle.blackOpaque**: A black opaque style.
title: UIActionSheetStyle.automatic
